answers.answer: Have you been tested for mono? You should go to the doctor and get tested for mono.
Go to your doctor.  Diabetes is another possible cause or it could just be a virus.  Best to find out.  Good luck.

I agree with last two posts. It could be mono...you get super super tired with mono.. almost bed bound.  But if anyone in your family has diabetes...get checked for it immedialty. The thirst is what would tip me off.   GET TO THE DOC.. either left untreated could be very dangerous..good luck now

question: I AM 18 YEARS OLD AND I HAVE BEEN EXPERIENCING A WHOLE BUNCH OF SYMPTOMS LIKE FREQUENT URINATION, FREQUENT THIRST, BACK ACHE, AND FEELING REALLY REALLY TIRED. DOES ANYONE KNOW WHATS WRONG?
title: REALLY TIRED
